points.content: Collaborated within a multi-disciplinary agile team of web developers and designers to create contemporary, high-performance, and sustainable systems specifically tailored for non-profits, churches, and ministries.
Utilized a diverse range of languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems throughout the entire development stack, including TypeScript, Next.js, React, Strapi, Node.js, and Azure.
Designed professional UI mockups and integrated them into fully functional production-ready websites, ensuring high fidelity to design specifications and user experience best practices.

Managed multiple website development projects, including scoping, planning, and overseeing technical architecture while leading and training a team of developers and designers to ensure seamless integration within the development stack.

Led the front-end redevelopment of Truthcasting, a church live-streaming platform, creating a modern and intuitive web experience across multiple interfaces, leading to a threefold increase in customer engagement and reach, significantly enhancing the platformâ€™s usability and performance.
Led hands-on software development initiatives, efficiently executing assigned tasks, and consistently meeting project deadlines.
Designed, programmed, and tested an iOS application using Swift, Xcode, Cocoa Touch, and other iOS development tools to ensure high-quality performance.
Successfully deployed an iOS application to the App Store, ensuring smooth distribution and availability.
